data.name: Ghost Hunt
data.detailed_description:
As a Paranormal Investigator for Ghost Hunt you will investigate strange occurrences at locations such as residential homes, graveyards, abandoned buildings. You must figure out what kind of entity(s) you are dealing with. Weather its a restless spirit waiting release to the afterlife or a demonic entity you must capture the danger is real, your life depends on being right.


  • Paranormal AI: They think.
  • Evidence: Using various tools collect evidence to determine the Entity type
  • Capture or Release: Find what the entities unfinished business is or its weakness and proceed with Summoning cautiously
  • Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics and sounds as well as having minimal user interfaces will ensure a totally immersive experience that will keep you on your toes.
  • Co-op multiplayer: Play alongside your friends with up to 5 players in this co-op horror where teamwork is key to your success.
  • Full Voice Recognition: The Entities are listening! Use your actual voice to interact with them!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 @ 4.2 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is my current system im developing on
